name: Linxura
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
What does the Linxura skill do?
The Linxura skill serves as a trigger to control a variety of devices in Alexa through Routines.

Why choose the Linxura skill?
- The Linxura smart controller is easy to operate.
- A single Linxura smart controller can control up to 52 smart home devices!

Where can you use the Linxura skill?
Use it at home, in the office, and anywhere you have smart home devices that work with Alexa.

How to use the Linxura skill?
- Search for the Linxura skill in the Alexa app and enable it.
- Link your button on the Linxura device with the Alexa platform within the Linxura app. This button will be shown in the Alexa app as a new device.
- Set up Routines to connect your device with smart home devices by selecting "When this happens" and adding an action with "Add action."
